question: 奔放
sourceMnemonic: Some day you'll <kanji>run</kanji> around, <kanji>release</kanji>d from the world and its troubles and you'll end up running <vocabulary>wild</vocabulary>. All your actions will be completely <vocabulary>uninhibited</vocabulary> when you aren't tied to your school or your job. It will be great!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Just watch out because <ja>ほう</ja> becomes <ja>ぽう</ja> here.
